turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Irish Baptist College.
turn.1: What is the Irish Baptist College?
turn.2: Irish Baptist College The Irish Baptist College (IBC) is a college, a department of the Association of Baptist Churches in Ireland (ABC).
turn.4: It is part of the Baptist Theological Centre which is located in the Baptist Centre and is shared with ABC.
turn.5: Is the college a religious college?
turn.6: IBC is accredited and reached Premier College Status by the Accreditation Service for International Colleges (ASIC).
turn.8: IBC began on 4 October 1892 in Dublin, now Republic of Ireland.
turn.9: Is the college still open today?
turn.10: In 1964 the college moved to a new campus in Belfast in Northern Ireland.
turn.12: On 10 May 2003 the college moved into the purpose built Baptist Theological Centre in the Baptist Centre located outside Lisburn in Moira in County Antrim.
